title: Pixel Stand suddenly charges very slowly (after June 2020 Android OS update)
content:
After the June 2020 Android 10 OS update, my Pixel 3 charges very very slowly in the Pixel Stand. I haven't added any new apps in a couple months now, so it's not a new faulty app.

A full charge used to take about 2.0-2.5 hours in the Pixel Stand. Now it takes about 8 hours. Very frustrating.

Charge speed via cable/USB-C is fine/unchanged -- the usual 1.5-2.0 quick charge.

I'm seeing several other threads here with other power charging or draining issues after Android OS updates. Hmmm....
